ygData.subject: Fashion choices
ygData.msgSnippet: I liked the color on lambent, especially when I had a mostly full suit on. When I started getting imbrued though, it didn t look as good. Then I got some
ygData.messageBody:
I liked the color on lambent, especially when I had a mostly full suit on.
When I started getting imbrued though, it didn't look as good. Then I got
some kylong, and a hero bracer, and it was commented on several times that I
was really multicolored. Now I have managed to go mostly green, between SS
and dragon stuff from WW. Still have my silver helm (I love my hammerhead
bucket!) and my imbrued boots to break the monotony of all green and it
keeps me from looking like a ranger! I prefer green overall and don't see
any major fashion shifts in the near future.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe (hoping Ragefire pops soon so I can go back to Phin
camping)
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
